title: Santa Barbara County MEHKO
description: Up to 30 meals/day Â· 90/week Â· state cap applies; annual county fee currently $391 (confirm current rate).

steps.title: Plan Your MEHKO
steps.content:
**What to do:** Confirm you can run a MEHKO at home and understand core limits.

**Why it matters:** You must operate within MEHKO rules to be approved and stay compliant.

**What you need:**
- â˜ Residence in Santa Barbara County
- â˜ Menu and daily/weekly production plan
- â˜ Basic kitchen setup meeting food safety practices

**Where/how:** Review county MEHKO overview; limits are summarized here (details below).

**Cost & time:** $0 Â· 10â€“30 minutes planning

**Ready when:** You can state your daily/weekly meal volume and that it fits MEHKO limits.
searchTerms: Santa Barbara County MEHKO 30 meals per day
Santa Barbara MEHKO 90 meals per week limit
Santa Barbara County Home Kitchen Operations limits
MEHKO limits Santa Barbara County

steps.title: Approvals & Training
steps.content:
**What to do:** Get your **Certified Food Protection Manager (CFPM)** credential and any needed property approvals.

**Why it matters:** Food safety certification is typically required and property rules may apply.

**What you need:**
- â˜ CFPM certificate (ANSI-CFP recognized)
- â˜ Landlord/HOA OK if applicable
- â˜ City business license if required in your jurisdiction

**Where/how:** Take an ANSI-approved CFPM course; check local business license rules.

**Cost & time:** ~$60â€“$90 Â· 1â€“2 days total (study + exam)

**Ready when:** You have a CFPM certificate PDF and any property/business approvals.
searchTerms: ANSI-CFP Food Protection Manager Santa Barbara
CFPM certification providers Santa Barbara County
Food safety manager course Santa Barbara
ANSI-CFP online course California

steps.title: Prepare Required Documents
steps.content:
**What to do:** Gather the documents you'll submit with your application.

**Why it matters:** Incomplete submissions delay approval and inspection.

**What you need:**
- â˜ **SOP form** â€” see **Step sop_form**
- â˜ **Health Permit Application** â€” see **Step permit_application_form**
- â˜ CFPM certificate (from training step)
- â˜ Government ID and basic business info

**Where/how:** Organize files (PDFs/photos) for upload or printing.

**Cost & time:** $0 Â· 30â€“60 minutes

**Ready when:** All documents are filled/signed and stored as PDFs.
searchTerms: Santa Barbara MEHKO SOP
MEHKO Standard Operating Procedures Santa Barbara PDF
Home Kitchen SOP Santa Barbara County
Food safety SOP MEHKO

steps.title: Standard Operating Procedures (SOP)
steps.content:
**What to do:** Fill the MEHKO SOP form covering menu, preparation, storage, and sanitation.

**Why it matters:** This shows the county how you will keep food safe at home.

**What you need:**
- â˜ Menu and ingredients list
- â˜ Prep/cooking/cooling/holding details
- â˜ Cleaning/sanitizing plan; handwashing setup

**Where/how:** Complete the SOP form in this step.

**Cost & time:** $0 Â· 30â€“60 minutes

**Ready when:** SOP is complete and consistent with your operation.
searchTerms: Santa Barbara MEHKO SOP template
Santa Barbara food safety SOP requirements
MEHKO Standard Operating Procedures Santa Barbara

steps.title: Health Permit Application (MEHKO)
steps.content:
**What to do:** Complete the county Health Permit Application for a Microenterprise Home Kitchen Operation.

**Why it matters:** This is the official request to operate a MEHKO.

**What you need:**
- â˜ Owner contact and site address
- â˜ CFPM certificate details
- â˜ SOP (see Step sop_form)

**Where/how:** Complete the application in this step.

**Cost & time:** $0 to fill Â· 15â€“30 minutes

**Ready when:** Application is complete and matches your SOP.
searchTerms: Santa Barbara County MEHKO application
MEHKO permit application Santa Barbara
Environmental Health permit application Santa Barbara
Home kitchen operations application form

steps.title: Submit Application & Fees
steps.content:
**What to do:** Submit your application packet and pay the annual MEHKO fee.

**Why it matters:** The county processes your permit after a complete submittal and payment.

**What you need:**
- â˜ Completed Application (see Step permit_application_form)
- â˜ Completed SOP (see Step sop_form)
- â˜ CFPM certificate
- â˜ Payment method for annual fee

**Where/how:** Submit to Environmental Health; call if you need help with submittal method.

**Cost & time:** **$391 annual fee** (current fee schedule) Â· 10â€“20 minutes

**Ready when:** County confirms receipt and payment.
searchTerms: Santa Barbara County Environmental Health fee schedule MEHKO
MEHKO annual fee Santa Barbara County 391
Environmental Health Services fees Santa Barbara
Home Kitchen Operations fee Santa Barbara

steps.title: Schedule & Pass Inspection
steps.content:
**What to do:** Coordinate a home kitchen inspection with Environmental Health after submittal.

**Why it matters:** Passing inspection is required before operating.

**What you need:**
- â˜ Kitchen ready per your SOP
- â˜ Thermometer, sanitizer, handwash setup
- â˜ All required equipment functional

**Where/how:** The department will provide scheduling details; call if you need to request a date.

**Cost & time:** Included in annual fee Â· 1â€“2 hours on site

**Ready when:** You receive a pass and any corrections are resolved.
searchTerms: MEHKO inspection checklist Santa Barbara
Home kitchen inspection preparation Santa Barbara
Environmental Health inspection MEHKO Santa Barbara
Food safety home kitchen inspection county of sb

steps.title: Receive Your Permit
steps.content:
**What to do:** Get your MEHKO permit after passing inspection and keep it on hand.

**Why it matters:** You must have a valid permit to operate.

**What you need:**
- â˜ Final approval notice
- â˜ Permit document

**Where/how:** Issued by Environmental Health after inspection approval.

**Cost & time:** $0 (after annual fee) Â· timeline varies by case

**Ready when:** You have the permit and any conditions noted by the inspector.
searchTerms: MEHKO permit status Santa Barbara County
Environmental Health permit issuance timeline Santa Barbara
Home kitchen permit delay Santa Barbara
Contact Environmental Health Santa Barbara status

steps.title: Operate & Stay Compliant
steps.content:
**What to do:** Follow your SOP and MEHKO limits; renew annually.

**Why it matters:** Staying within rules protects customers and your permit status.

**What you need:**
- â˜ Daily/weekly meal logs under limits
- â˜ Temperature & cleaning records
- â˜ Permit renewal reminder

**Where/how:** Keep simple records; contact the department if your menu or volume changes.

**Cost & time:** Annual fee on renewal Â· ongoing

**Ready when:** You track meals, keep records, and schedule renewal on time.
searchTerms: Santa Barbara MEHKO meal tracking
MEHKO 30 meals/day recordkeeping Santa Barbara
Home kitchen operations limits tracking
Meal logs MEHKO Santa Barbara
